alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:01PM EDT until August 12 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Harrison County in east central Ohio... Northwestern Jefferson County in east central Ohio... Carroll County in east central Ohio... Northeastern Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 501 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Dennison, or 8 miles northeast of Uhrichsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Uhrichsville, Carrollton, Dennison, Hopedale, Scio, Midvale, Jewett, Bergholz, Amsterdam, Bowerston, Barnhill, Dellroy, Sherrodsville, Roswell, Leesville, Mechanicstown, Atwood Lake, Kilgore, Leesville Lake Park, and Harlem Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Ohio. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
